Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory157.png'}
{3: 'After defeating the mechanical guards, a large number of grubs pour out of their bellies and pile up all over the stage.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Ah... all the money... gone...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She falls to the ground, defeated.'}
{2: '(Hand over the ticket to Pulao)', 3: '8'}
{2: "I don't need grubs.", 3: '10'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "You don't want it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Share it with the people on this ship.', 3: '133'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Could I... keep some of it? If Akdilek and the others find out... Sob...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fine.', 3: '17', 4: 'Next time, put the fine print in a bigger font.', 5: '17'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Sob...Thanks, I'll make sure it's big and obvious next time.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Next time, learn your lesson and stop pulling these little tricks.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's get everyone back.", 3: '23'}
{3: 'She nods in dejection and stands, then quickly disappears behind the curtain of light.'}
{2: 'Looks like Pulao still has a lot to learn about business.', 3: '26'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Well... I think she did pretty good.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Merchants not only have to curate events and promote them, but they also need to be ready for unexpected emergencies.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "She hasn't been exposed to any of these. It's understandable that she didn't know to register the tickets with real names.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Changyu didn't remind her, either.", 3: '33', 4: "Sophia didn't remind her, either.", 5: '33'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That's right.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Did they miss it as well?', 3: '35', 4: 'Is there some other agenda?', 5: '35'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "There's too little information at present to know for sure.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I see... there's more to commerce and business than I imagined.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But... is it okay to give up the prize just like that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Of course.', 3: '41', 4: 'At least it was fun this time.', 5: '41'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't blame me for reminding you, there's a report to write when you get back.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Ah... a momentary rise is detected in the commandant's blood pressure...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's gather some more information before leaving the Nighter. We'll all help.", 4: '1'}
